Name: Cute Cats PuZZles
About the game: Do you like puzzles? And maybe cats? Then this game is for you! Here you can collect puzzle pictures with cats! Cats in the game are different, pictures of different sizes - there are small, and there are big ones. Features: -Genre: Puzzle -Cute cats -10 puzzles available for game -Different size puzzles (you can choose small and large) -Simple and fun gameplay (just pick a puzzle and drag the pieces to collect it) -Good soundtrack -Steam Achievements with Cats
